name: dayz-local-panel
description: DayZ Local Panel (OmegaManager / CFTools inspired) - self-hosted DayZ server manager with file-based storage

scripts.build: npm -w @dayz-panel/web run build && npm -w @dayz-panel/server run build
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n SERVER,WEB "npm -w @dayz-panel/server run dev" "npm -w @dayz-panel/web run dev"
